text: 5|108|E'i pad'dhatiye'i ati nikatatama ye, sihamte saksya sathikabharae upasthapana karaiba athaba sihamte (micha saksya pradanakaraisakale) bhaya karaiba ye, sihamtara (nikatatmisakalara) sapatara pichata (purbokta) sapata pratyakhyana karaa haâ€™ba. Tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau suna, allahe phachika sampradayaka hidayata nakarae.
